Hometown: Lahore

Masters of Business Administration  May 2022

Bachelors in Business Administration  (Honors)   June  2021  
Major (Marketing) Minor (Media Studies)  
Lahore School of Economics           
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE         
ProntoDigital, LLC                                                                                               June  2021 – February 2022  
Business Development Executive  
 Responsible for finding and retaining new clients, Handling Upwork profiles.  
 Maintained relationships with clients by providing them information and guidance.  
 Generated weekly sales reports and provided useful insights.  
ProntoDigital, LLC                                                                        March  2022 – May 2022  
Junior Project Associate  
 Managed and build a Data Analytics team.  
 Managed to achieve the target of $20,000 in 3 months.  
Bank of Punjab                       June-August  2018 
Operations Intern, Operations  
 Responsible to deal with branch daily operations and Opening of new accounts.  
Detechgear  
Marketing Executive                                                                                                                                                     July- Dec 2020  
 Managed all Digital Marketing  of the business.  
 Achieved sales of 500,000 in 5 months.  
PROJECTS  
Strategic Management : Strategic decision making and analyzing a company’s performance by looking at different factors. 
Using tools like IFE, EFE, CPM, QSPM , etc.  
Advertising:  Product adaption of Clear Shampoo according to Pakistani Market. Devised the entire advertising plan 
incorporating all the strategies and storyboard . 
Sales Force Management : Analyzed the Sales channel of FFC and developed the strategy to strengthen the Salesforce  
channel.  
Marketing Research: Conducted qualitative and quantita tive research on Nokia Pakistan.  
ADDITIONAL EXPERIENCE  
Teacher Assistant , Lahore School of Economics                                                                                                2021 – 2022 
Marketing Intern , Signature Lifestyle.  
 Managed all Digital Marketing campaigns and marketing strategies.              March -July 2022   
HONORS & AWARDS  
 Winner of LSE Business Fiesta 2021  
 25% Scholarship in Lahore  School of Economics  
SKILLS & INTERESTS  
 Competent user of M icrosoft Office , Vegas Pro, SPSS, Smar t PLS , Shopify, and Ecommerce 
Management.  
     Digital Marketing, Upwork , Click Up, Slack, FB Ads, Google AdWords , Google Analytics, Canva.  
            Strategic Planning, Leadership, Comfortable in Team work.
input.additional_info: Preferred universities include National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences in Pakistan and equivalent institutions. We offer relocation support for candidates based outside of the hiring city, subject to management approval. Skills are assessed through a combination of technical tests, project management case studies, and panel interviews consisting of departmental heads and HR representatives.
minimum_requirements: Master's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field
